title: Feedback Design Strategies in Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core game-based learning principles and foundational educational functions of feedback
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for medical/legal/technical experts to develop game-based learning designs applicable to elementary education settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four-dimensional feedback model (type, content, format, frequency, and provider) in game-based learning to practical cases.
Learners can design personalized feedback strategies to enhance learner motivation.
Learners can evaluate integration approaches of game elements and feedback systems.

resources: Game Development Tools (Unity/Unreal Engine Educational Editions)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
